column1: #Text=But then I wo n't be able to see as well .
#Text=Finally , a stylish shoe for the blind earthbender .
#Text=" Katara says : " How do I look ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh ... your mom 's necklace .
#Text=I guess it 's pretty obviously Water Tribe , is n't it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I used to visit my friend Kuzon here a hundred years ago .
#Text=So , everyone just follow my lead and stay cool .
#Text=Or , as they say in the Fire Nation , " stay flamin ' " .
#Text=" Fire Nation man says : " Uh , hi .
#Text=I guess ... " Aang says : " Oh , we 're going to a meat place ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on , Aang , everyone here eats meat .
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys go ahead .
#Text=I 'll just get some lettuce out of the garbage .
#Text=" Male soldier says : " It could n't be more obvious that you do n't belong here .
#Text=Next time you play hooky , you might wan na take off your school uniform .
#Text=Is this a new mind ready for molding ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , the colonies , of course .
#Text=The Fire Nation colonies in the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Kwan says : " Your etiquette is terrible .
#Text=In the homeland , we bow to our elders .
#Text=" Kwan says : " And we do n't wear head coverings indoors .
#Text=" Aang says : " Um ... I have a scar .
#Text=Or should we just call you " Mannerless Colony Slob " ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Just " slob " is fine .
#Text=" Aang says : " We made it through the day Momo , and it was pretty fun .
#Text=" On Ji says : " Do n't let the headmaster catch you with that monkey .
#Text=" On Ji says : " Do n't worry , I 'm not a tattletale .
#Text=I like your headband , by the way .
#Text=" Hide says : " On Ji , you do n't have to baby - sit the new kid .
#Text=You must be one of those popular kids I 've been hearing about .
#Text=I know you 're from the colonies , so I 'll say this slowly .
#Text=" Aang says : " It was nice meeting you .
#Text=" Shoji says : " I do n't believe it , he did n't beat you up .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess I 'm just lucky .
#Text=" Shoji says : " We were on our way to play hide and explode .
#Text=" Katara says : " Where have you been ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I got invited to play with some kids after school .
#Text=" Aang says : " I enrolled in a Fire Nation school , and I 'm going back tomorrow .
